metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9330 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in tif_packbits.c in bmp2tif in libtiff 4.0.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via crafted BMP image, related to dimensions, which triggers an out-of-bounds read.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9330` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.2').
